website_summaries.verdict: The rugged design and snug fit make it an undeniable choice for outdoor adventures and traveling.
pros: Tough bottom panel to protect the contents of the bag
cons: Least affordable option of all items on our list

customer_reviews.title: Stood the test of time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my son as he started Middle school. It’s a huge bag and carried the super heavy load he had every day. It was dropped on the playground, and shuffled everywhere we went. Even given the heaviness of his load, this backpack never broke a singe thing. Even after the school year ended it is completely intact. It’s hard to find a backpack that survives my 12 year old the entire school year like this one did. I will be getting a new one since I washed up the old one and it is now my husbands.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Lee Richardson

customer_reviews.title: All you need!!
customer_reviews.text: After years of carrying around oversized gym bags, this is the one that finally replaces them all. This bag is able to hold my basketball, a pair of size 11.5 shoes, as well as space for water bottles, supplements and valuables. The top zipper is great for storing valuables such as phone and headphones as the pockets are lined and soft. The two side compartments hold my supplements and shakers. Overall, a very stylish and good looking product. Under Armour hit it out of the park with this one. I was hesitant spending $50+ on a gym bag, but this bag is certainly worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trip and gym backpack
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big XXL guy and I was able to put 4-5 days of clothes for a road trip. This backpack is amazing and also looks really good. Can't wait to start using it for the gym. You can fit even a basketball in it and the separated compartments allows to isolate shoes and wet/used clothes. UPDATE 1: I started using it for the gym. I'm putting on it: full size basket ball, training shoes, socks, shirt, underwear and a couple of accessories. And still I have some spare space. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Urdaneta

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy, quality backpack!
customer_reviews.text: His is a really good backpack! My son is hard on backpacks. They get thrown around. We've had zippers break in the past. He's been using this one 7 weeks so far & it still looks brand new. It feels very sturdy. Good quality. Nice & spacious & easily accessible through open top. His huge binder goes in & out no problem. Update: this backpack is simply amazing! It lasted him ALL year, with no damage & im considering using it for ANOTHER year because it is such great shape! I just bought him a 4 INCH binder & wondered if it would fit inside the top/main opening....IT DOES!!! 2 thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy B.

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Could only give this item 4 stars because realistically, this bag is slightly smaller overall than a Rothco (blk) book bag that I purchased earlier, & the Rothco bag only cost me less than 1/3 what this bag cost me. But I purchased this for the color scheme & because this bag is more compartmentalized than the Rothco. So overall, I'm satisfied with the purchase, I'm just not so sure that a $69 price tag is justifiable for such a small bag, if it was more in the $50 - $55 range (or less) 5 STARS.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this bag for anyone who is traveling or for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a carry on for my international travel. It held my Mac air (it has a padded sleeve to keep your laptop separate), my iPad mini, my slr digital camera, some chargers, a few travel books and some spare clothes with extra room to spare! I didn't realize this was for sports and could carry a basketball. I'll definitely be using this bag when I go play ball in the park. I would highly recommend this bag for anyone who is traveling or for anyone playing sports! Very comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Good for small space items
customer_reviews.text: It works for my purpose. I just needed something to tote my laptop, ipad, headset(s), cords, phone and a lunch/snacks. On the flip side, if I needed to carry books or other larger items, I'd have to shy away from this bag. The great pocket on the front expands into the main compartment. So while I have a lot of misc junk in there I really only have room for my laptop and a small snack in the main compartment. A better alternative will be to look for a bag that expand out instead of in when the front pocket is filled.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great HS. daily use bag
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, Purchased for a teenager to do High School with. For the day to day it's great! Sturdy and pockets and zips are sturdy. He can even get his UnderArmour Lunch Box in it and his iPad /cell and extra shoes. School notebooks. Daily use. Not recommended as a gym bag. For that we purchased an UnderArmour gym bag. Well worth the investment of $$. Especially for teen guys.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gym bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and exactly as shown. I have only used a couple of time but you can fit a lot of gear in this bag. I get shoes, workout cloths, gloves, iPad and more in it every time I go to the gym. The two side zip pocket hold full size shaker bottles which is really nice when packing to hit the gym right after work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Cole Wisco

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far....spacious and fits everything we need.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for middle school. it doesn't look like it in the picture but this is a very spacious bookbag. He has a 3 ring binder, another binder and several composition books, his planner and still there's room for his gym clothes and lunch box. it seems to be well made (hopefully will last a couple of years at least). love it so far (only been a week though)
customer_reviews.author: Chic

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best purchase I made all
customer_reviews.text: Life saver backpack! I use this for school. Theres a pouch in the back where my laptop slides right in. I can keep my books and notebooks in front of that, and that misc items in the very front. I carry a huge hydroflask water bottle in the side pouch and a coffee mug in the other. Probably the best purchase I made all year
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Couture

customer_reviews.title: great school bag
customer_reviews.text: bought one of these 2 years ago for my son who seems to carry 50lbs of books on a daily basis and is really hard on backpacks. a zipper broke and bought a new one. great price for a UA backpack and big opening at top making it easier to get things in and out.
customer_reviews.author: DLO

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: So far I absolutely love this backpack and I've gotten so manly compliments on it! It's nice a roomie inside, there are enough compartments and pockets to stay organized. I use this for work and I can fit workout clothes, shoes, laptop, jacket, water bottle, basically my life...
customer_reviews.author: cleutz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic backpack. Bought it for a trip to Europe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic backpack. Bought it for a trip to Europe, use it now everyday for the gym and the golf course. Front pocket is just big enough to hold size 10 shoes, but can be used also for sweaty gym clothes. One of the best UA purchases I've made so far!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Taillie

customer_reviews.title: My poor son has so many books and binders to carry
customer_reviews.text: My poor son has so many books and binders to carry. His backpack wasn't big enough to hold everything so we ordered this one. It is a great size and the one large pouch allows for a lot of books and binders. I was worried about the quality because a lot of backpacks fall apart quickly. this one has held up very well without any pulling in the seams.
customer_reviews.author: BraMas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent capacity and well made. It is a great looking backpack. The colors don't show dirt and the material is durable. The side pockets are huge, large enough to hold a water bottle or snacks. The top opens wide enough to easily see everything inside and there are many places to organize and place things so that they don't just rattle around inside. Love this backpack--worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pack for about two years, it is excellent. Holds up very well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great for a college student and hiking pack
customer_reviews.text: Best book bag I've ever had. Awesome for school, with a large central compartment, and side organizer pockets. Also great way to carry your gear for a hiking trip, as a day pack. An extra bonus that it's water resistant for several hours. Walking around on a college campus, that has definitely come in handy. All in all, this pack is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack for my high school daughter
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack for my high school daughter. It is large enough to fit all that she needs and padded well. The only negative I can say are that the adjustable straps are too long and really don't need to be. Under Armour backpacks are worth the extra $ because they hold up well and will last more than 1 year. I was used to buying backpacks for my kids every year because they are so hard on them.
customer_reviews.author: Tami T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sports backpack. I've been on a mission to find my perfect backpack and this is close. Only things that it's lacking for me is a double zipper for the main compartment and also a double zipper for the front pocket. This backpack has good space in the main compartment, great space in the side pockets and the front pocket also. I've only had the backpack for a week, but so far, it seems to be well made. The shoulder straps are comfortable and it feels great wearing the backpack. Can't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Lin

customer_reviews.title: Silly design, and too big
customer_reviews.text: Too big. Returning. Thing feels like the Ninja Turtle Shell I never wanted. Probably good for people 6'-4" and over. Also the compartments are way too zero sum. Putting something in the front compartment just takes away space from the main. Inner lining feels cheap enough to rip. The side pockets are internal, which is dumb because if external they offer access to water bottles etc., but since internal, they can't be accessed without unzipping, and, again, they take away real estate from main area.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! It is heavy duty will get lots of use from it! My son is a freshman and one of those that carry's his whole locker in his backpack! I have no worry! Also he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Hyson

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son and I was amazed with the size of this bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and I was amazed with the size of this bad. He can fit basketball uniform, sweats and two pairs of basketball in the bag... did I mention that my son wears a size 14... so imagine two pairs of size 14 basketball sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Ree M

customer_reviews.title: Great for Basketball Players!!
customer_reviews.text: Rarely, cannot justify paying more for a backpack. In this case, I can 100%. I play basketball at least a few times a week including games and this is incredibly convenient. I can fit my basketball, shoes, multiple water bottles, etc in the backpack, with no issues whatsoever. I have been very pleased after purchasing this. It makes traveling and getting in and out of the gym a breeze for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Todd P

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Son uses it as a basketball bag. Fits his size 9 men shoes and a basketball!
customer_reviews.author: Tabilee

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack! Lots of storage space. Love that it has a pocket for your shoes to go in so they aren't mixed in with everything else in your bag. Great bag for work, gym and school. Cant say enough good things about this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: A. Case

customer_reviews.title: this doesn’t rip like all of the other bags he had
customer_reviews.text: This is the only bag that will fit all of my son’s stuff! After about one school year of taking a beating, this doesn’t rip like all of the other bags he had. He likes the way it opens up at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! I love how much it can carry. The front compartment is perfect for my gym shoes. They stay away from the rest of my clothes/toiletries. The side pockets are great for my gym flipflops and my cell/smaller items. The main compartment can hold my gym/street clothes, towel and toiletry kit. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. I can keep shoes and dirty clothes in the front panel and clean clothes and towel in the main part of the backpack. The side pockets is big enough to fit a 32 oz. Hydroflask and/or large shaker bottles (one on each side).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son took this to school today and when he picked it up, he put on his back and was soo happy with it. He had the cord shoulder straps before and I felt so bad for him. His book literally weigh a ton. So, when we switched the book bags, he couldn't be happier. He made a comment this morning about how good this feels.
customer_reviews.author: Tallandslender

customer_reviews.title: Big Daddy Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large backpack with many compartments to utilize. I gave 4 stars because I really wish it's computer compartment held up to a 17". I love everything thing else about it!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who is a High School soccer player. It is perfect for all of her gear and she is very happy with it. Lots of 'pockets' and areas for different items - water bottle, socks, cleats, uniform, etc. It is extremely sturdy and still looks like new at the end of the season. We were even able to get the backpack in the school colors which was the perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MFox

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite backpack to lug around at the gym and back and forth to work. The straps are super comfortable and Sir perfect when the bag is loaded down or half empty. Plenty of storage and I love the pockets on the side!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping, Excellent Product, A+ Seller! Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping, Excellent Product, A+ Seller! Very Happy! This backpack looks great and is so durable. My kiddo just loves it!
customer_reviews.author: PixieGirly21

customer_reviews.title: This back pack always offers durability and lots of room ...
customer_reviews.text: This back pack always offers durability and lots of room for high school books and athletic uniforms. I always buy UA because they last. My other son has had his back pack for three tears. We only updated this year for a change.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Could use more compartments
customer_reviews.text: Lots of Space, but the bottom pouch is built into the main compartment making it a little awkward as it takes up space in the main compartment Still a Good Backpack I have the blue bag and the color has faded
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good; quality bag with just enough room for all my crossfit gear; could use a few more pockets but not bad for the price. Of course the last bag I bought and rated well ended up braking two weeks later so we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Colon

customer_reviews.title: Stitching isn't holding up.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool, great colors, huge bag. Stitching coming apart after only one month of school use! Will contact Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jan S

customer_reviews.title: Durable for teenager.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking backpack and durable. My daughter has been using since Dec 16 and still holding up to daily school and sports activities. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Military Mom

customer_reviews.title: get red its a conversation starter
customer_reviews.text: i get alot of comments on the street from people saying they like the color of the bag....first really hard rain storm today and everything inside stayed nice and dry even my laptop.....
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great price
customer_reviews.text: Daily use for a commuter of public transportation. This bag holds up very well, especially with heavy items in it. Straps are comfortable for a big guy like me (5'7 350#), they don't hurt around the shoulder area like other bags do. Zippers are strong and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: PapaStompy

customer_reviews.title: College Review.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable backpack with very painless ease of use. Laptop protection in the bag is great at cushioning from within the bag, but little on the side that faces the outward (towards the wearers back). I did need to purchase a laptop sleeve for extra peace of mind. Otherwise, incredibly great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this one for my high schooler. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for my high schooler. It is very roomy and fits a number for textbooks and binders. The other backpacks that I have looked at have lots of compartments but that cuts down on the amount of space for books.
customer_reviews.author: Pia

customer_reviews.title: It's an amazing bag, but my specific bag has a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing bag, but my specific bag has a huge tear in the bottom of the bag, making it very precarious when carrying stuff. I wish the product material was better, but I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag for middle school and high school
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for middle school and high school. I have three sons and they have the same bag in 3 different colors. It is sturdy, holds all their books and has many compartments for storing things. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack to take to the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday to put my workout clothes in. It is perfect for that because of the one large compartment. Nice quality overall, no complaints. It is nice to free up your hands from carrying around a duffle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A Hovis

customer_reviews.title: And very spacious I loved it. I plan to use it to store ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this back with me on a mission trip to Thailand for 2 weeks. I must say it IS VERY DURABLE. And very spacious I loved it. I plan to use it to store my 💻 . Good for school I only wish it had some holders for pens & pencils ✏️ but it's all good
customer_reviews.author: Richie Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Great color =))
customer_reviews.text: Really durable and large! Used it in my trip to Asia and still using as gym bag! Can put my 15 inch laptop and all gym clothes. Reccomend to buy! P.S. Great color =))
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a bag that can hold up to a 6th grader's abuse!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent school bag for my 6th grader who literally carries 75# daily back & forth. This is the only bag that has EVER held up more than 6weeks while still looking brand new. And it holds EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came late, but love it
customer_reviews.text: My son got his first UA backpack a couple of years ago and it went through 2 school years, and now on his second year of middle school it's time for a new backpack. He loves it and it's a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Caswell

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it holds 2 large cameras and all ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use as a camera bag. I love it, it holds 2 large cameras and all the gear I need. I has a decent amount of padding (I do pad the cameras more inside). It is very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Itzkie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! My son use this bag for his books during the week for school and his sporting events on weekends. He plays basketball and loves the fact that he can fit 2 basketballs in it.
customer_reviews.author: JustAskMe

customer_reviews.title: The bag is comfortable, durable
customer_reviews.text: The bag is comfortable, durable, and looks good. However, the straps look cheap and plasticy, but that may just be a trend with these types of backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Veenu

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bag, I use this when riding my motorcycle ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT bag, I use this when riding my motorcycle and need to carry gym clothes. The front "ball pocket" fits a mens size 12 shoe! The side pockets are great for a water bottle and the top smaller pocket on the lid fits all of your smaller items like gym card, keys, headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, large bag
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and quality. A large bag for sprots or carry on (flight).
customer_reviews.author: Heather G uillen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and spacious, holds its shape, still looks great after 5 months of daily use lugging 30 lbs of books, a computer and school supplies.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack and at a reasonable price. Quality bag and use it often for general travel.
customer_reviews.author: SWILLY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift for my grandson, he absolutely loves it for his basketball gear and change clothinng!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Thou its a nice really nice quality bag 😊
customer_reviews.text: My man plays basketball and its a little smaller than he thougth it would be for his needs.. Thou its a nice really nice quality bag 😊
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Great for sporty teenager
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for my teenager..carries all his things, no need for locker runs anymore! Holding up wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack. I use it to carry my gym ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack. I use it to carry my gym clothes and my school stuff. It has separate, sealed compartments so your smelly clothes don't have to mix with your clean clothes or school stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Will Corley

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage and very sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack yet that we have found. The main zipper section is very large and can hold a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Erin m

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite backpack for hiking or overnight/weekend getaways
customer_reviews.text: very spacious and durable. This is my favorite backpack for hiking or overnight/weekend getaways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a bag and it is made good and will last
customer_reviews.author: John Randall Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not arrive on time, but product was as described.
customer_reviews.author: EZEQUIEL DEANDA

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour backpack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack- great quality and heavy duty. Looks great, has tons of pockets. Highly recommended for kids or adults. Many colors choices
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son uses this every day for school. Large, sturdy and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: AnitainNJ

customer_reviews.title: It is so sturdy, has a lot of room for his binders ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a back to school backpack for my 10 year old grandson, he absolutely loves it. It is so sturdy, has a lot of room for his binders and school books. The straps are awesome, they balance the weight of the pack which is quite heavy with all his school books.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style and one fantastic backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite backpack. I use it for coaching teaching and as a diaper bag. I even contemplated using this as our team at duffel bag for my varsity soccer team. This is an incredibly comfortable backpack and makes all my other backpacks seem like torture devices.
customer_reviews.author: ManaBee

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a nice backpack. My son is using it for 7th ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice backpack. My son is using it for 7th grade so too early to tell if it will make it through the school year.
customer_reviews.author: JDF

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Very strong, For my son 11 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Rene RB

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! I walk to work and this holds my lunch bag, ipad, phone, small umbrella with still room to spare. Extremely comfortable and in the first rainstorm, everything inside stayed dry. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy M. Miles

customer_reviews.title: ... this one out for his school bag and absolutely love the cool factor
customer_reviews.text: My tween picked this one out for his school bag and absolutely love the cool factor. I love it for the good quality and the classic look. It will be the go to bag for all of middle school. Love that the front pocket can fit a pair of sneakers for his sport events too.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoTravel

customer_reviews.title: Medium duty pack
customer_reviews.text: Gave this 3 stars. This is a medium duty pack. They could improve on the zippers and the top carry handle should be a lot thicker to handle more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag UA!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son and he was able to fit all of his school binders in it with room to spare! He LOVES the color, true to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and durable. Straps are thick and comfortable. 14-year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander76

customer_reviews.title: Big bag, nice style
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect to carry everything I take to the gym. Plus it's sturdy enough to stand up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected. I can now fit more junk ...
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected. I can now fit more junk while coaching.
customer_reviews.author: Hilorain

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy the bag again!
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for my son and his million of sports activities. He loves the bag and it is very durable! I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: misscoop

customer_reviews.title: Straps don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack, but the strap ripped apart a few months after getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack. My son loves it and all of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack. My son loves it and all of his school stuff fits great in it. So far it is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Conradt

customer_reviews.title: A good sport bag!
customer_reviews.text: My friend love it!It's fit for him.A good sport bag!
customer_reviews.author: Bai Yan

customer_reviews.title: Backpack of my dreams!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack!!! The amount it holds and the way it opens is incomparable. Wish they had it for cheaper in the color black. Otherwise a really awesome backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and son is happy with it. He plays every sport so constantly has a full bag.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these that goes to campus every day and, despite a lot of wear and tear, is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: DC Metro Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for his needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons birthday. He states that he loves it. Perfect for his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry  Tripoli

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Backpack looks great, but the shoe compartment is very small; plus the nylon on the pockets feels very thin.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: Spacious!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy and spacious! Great for my son's 3 inch binder and books. The side pockets actually hold a full size bottle of water. The only change I would make is to make the front zippered pocket deeper by extending it outward a bit to hold a lunch bag. Well made and the shoulder straps are very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: cj2010

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely roomy. Cargo space is very large, and the pockets (front + sides) can hold large items as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Less usable. More cool looking.
customer_reviews.text: Feels smaller and less usable. That my old underarmor backpack
customer_reviews.author: y. phildickian

customer_reviews.title: Already torn!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the back pack for the new school year which started the 1st week of August and it has already torn 3 weeks into the school year!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed as the durability was why I chose this product ...
customer_reviews.text: My High school age son had this less then a full school year when it broke. I was very disappointed as the durability was why I chose this product to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: janel

customer_reviews.title: including his helmet easily. We packed all of his clothes and toiletries ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very large. We can fit all of my sons snowboarding gear, including his helmet easily. We packed all of his clothes and toiletries for a 4 day trip to Vegas and still had extra room. (My son is 14) Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite bag. I use it everyday for work. A place for the iPad, accessories, a change of clothes, and a lot of space left over. I love the separate front pouch for dirty work/gym clothes. Plus, it just looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my son's narrow locker ... he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jkhoek88

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack! :)
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was worth the money. It's much bigger than I thought it would be, which is a plus! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this backpack! It is perfect size for all his books and practice clothes for football. Seems to be made very well and holds up to all the weight of the books.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walcher

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag fit all the criteria of a picky 10 yr old: room for a basketball, shoes and a water bottle. She loves it so much that she uses it for school everyday too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great gear bag.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter who filled it right up and has been using it regularly for all of her sports. Good look. Solid bag for a 10 year old on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J Vis Jr

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack ever!. I use it all day lono and always carrying many clothes for the gym. You can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: Under Armour Storm Undeniable II Backpack
product_meta.description: UA Storm technology delivers an element-battling, highly water-resistant finish. Tough, abrasion-resistant bottom panel. Foam reinforced panels add protection . Soft-lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15” MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop . Water-repellent front valuables pocket to keep your stuff safe. Adjustable HeatGear shoulder straps for extra comfort. Ergonomic foam padded back panel. Extra large main compartment with easy top loader access. 2 side-zip water bottle pockets. Fits a size 5 soccer ball & an NBA-sized basketball . D-ring for additional attachment point. Dimensions: 19" x 11" x 7". "
feature_bullets: UA Storm technology delivers an element battling, highly water resistant finish
Soft lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15" MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop
Water repellent front valuables pocket to keep your stuff safe
